Key Match Events: The Cubs scored 11 times in the 7th inning to pull off a shocking victory.
Christian Bethancourt blasted a two-run homer in the 7th inning.
Bethancourt brought home two more runs with a double in the 8th inning.
Bethancourt lined a go-ahead two-run single in the 9th inning.
Ian Happ, Mike Tauchman, and Seiya Suzuki each singled home runs in the 9th inning.
Porter Hodge pitched a second inning of work to earn the win.
Post-Match Reflections: The Cubs desperately needed the comeback win to stay in the race.
The Cubs scored 41 runs over the three games of the sweep.
The dramatic win provides a flicker of hope for the Cubs.
